This is the .rmd file for some quick visualization for descriptive stats.

```{r dataloader, echo = FALSE}
source('utils/utils.R')
```

```{r}
Complete_test_wide <- read_csv('../data/COVIDdata_merged_Haoxue_version.csv')
```

# Time Interval

```{r}
Complete_test_wide %>% ggplot(aes(x=as.double(Delta_Dat))) +
   geom_histogram(aes(fill=Platform), color='black') +
   xlab('T2-T1 (days)')

```
